name: the second-greatest internet war of all time
name_original: the second-greatest internet war of all time
description:
Game-play:

"the second-greatest internet war of all time" is a short sequence of minigames which will probably take you about 5 minutes to beat. Some of the minigames are a bit weird. Most of them don't even have music. They're mostly pretty simple. There isn't much more to say really.

Story:

Copy-pasted from the intro sequence:

You've been putting up with the abysmal speeds of Bombcrest's internet service for too long. It's long overdue that you got a new provider.
PB & J General Need Internet has been sounding pretty good.

Unfortunately, Bombcrest's internet service has an... unusual clause.
You missed it while signing up, so you're learning this one the hard way.
Long story short, they're allowed to do anything to your computer to try to stop you.

And they're currently putting that clause into effect.
Can you get past all their countermeasures and change internet services?
Or will you forever be stuck with the awful service that is Bombcrest?

In either case, you'd better disable these countermeasures...
They're kind of getting in the way of you using your computer.
And seeing as how your job is as a programmer... well, you'd better get this over with fast!

Side note:

I hope you enjoy the game! Thanks for giving the page a look.
